statements: SELECT * FROM adherence_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name, adherence_score FROM adherence_reports;
SELECT report_name, audit_date FROM adherence_reports WHERE adherence_score > 90;
SELECT audit_type, adherence_score FROM adherence_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, audit_type FROM adherence_reports WHERE audit_type = 'Monthly' AND adherence_score < 80;
SELECT report_name, adherence_score, audit_date FROM adherence_reports WHERE adherence_score > 90 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM adherence_reports WHERE audit_type = 'Daily' AND adherence_score < 80;
SELECT report_name, audit_type FROM adherence_reports ORDER BY adherence_score DESC, audit_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT audit_type FROM adherence_reports;
SELECT report_name, adherence_score FROM adherence_reports WHERE audit_type != 'Weekly';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryGuidelines;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_description FROM RegulatoryGuidelines WHERE guideline_category='Legal';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryGuidelines ORDER BY guideline_id DESC;
SELECT guideline_category, COUNT(*) AS category_count FROM RegulatoryGuidelines GROUP BY guideline_category;
SELECT report_date, auditor_name, audit_type FROM AuditReports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryGuidelines WHERE guideline_category = 'Healthcare';
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_description FROM RegulatoryGuidelines WHERE guideline_id > 5 ORDER BY guideline_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuditReports WHERE audit_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, auditor_name, audit_outcome FROM AuditReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT guideline_description AS description, guideline_category AS category FROM RegulatoryGuidelines WHERE guideline_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryGuidelines;
SELECT guideline_name, guideline_description FROM RegulatoryGuidelines;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audited_entity FROM Audits;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE audit_type='internal';
SELECT report_id, findings, recommendations FROM AuditReports;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryGuidelines;
SELECT guideline_name, guideline_description FROM RegulatoryGuidelines ORDER BY guideline_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE audit_type='external';
SELECT audited_entity, auditor_name FROM Audits ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, audit_id, report_date, findings FROM AuditReports WHERE audit_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM regulatory_guidelines;
SELECT guideline_description, entry_id, date_created FROM regulatory_guidelines;
SELECT * FROM internal_audit_records ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_result FROM internal_audit_records WHERE audit_result = 'Passed';
SELECT audit_findings, auditor_company FROM external_audit_records WHERE report_submitted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_guidelines ORDER BY entry_id DESC;
SELECT guideline_description FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE entry_id = 1;
SELECT report_text, audit_date FROM audit_reports WHERE audit_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT auditor_name, audit_result FROM internal_audit_records WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT auditor_company, audit_findings FROM external_audit_records WHERE report_submitted = TRUE ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM external_audit_reports;
SELECT report_name, audit_date FROM internal_audit_reports WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT guideline_name, category FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE category = 'Compliance' LIMIT 5;
SELECT audit_date, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT report_name, auditor_name FROM external_audit_reports WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_name, audit_date FROM internal_audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM external_audit_reports WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM internal_audit_reports;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE category = 'Compliance' ORDER BY guideline_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, auditor_name FROM internal_audit_reports WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
